description.en:
Paradigm Zero is a tax-less ERC20 contract paradigm that allows for fund raising with zero tax and no pre-loaded wallets. It at once introduces a market-making layer to AMMs and allows for crypto projects to introduce a new revenue generating vector into the mix: by weaponizing available liquidity.

In a way that we believe will become a DeFi smart contract standard (we will be applying for an EIP), Paradigm Zero generates project revenue by leveraging the project’s DEX liquidity in a way that is at once tax-free for the investor, has unnoticeable price impact, and helps projects improve their liquidity in more effective ways.

Paradigm Zero’s vision is straightforward: to build a unique and sustainable ecosystem of projects and tooling centered around its groundbreaking contract.
